item.title: By: M. David Peterson
item.dc:creator: M. David Peterson
item.description:
>> Hard to be underground when you have main stream media reporting on it :-)
I like that :) Very good point... It's always interesting to see how an "underground hacking society" adjusts to the main stream. Definitely something I now have tagged to keep an eye on. It seems to me that the bridge to the mainstream world can be a difficult bridge to build, and in many cases results in something similar to "Galloping Gurdy" because of some key design flaws that, at the time, were not obvious enough to have warranted consideration.

>> Hard to be underground when you have main stream media reporting on it ðŸ™‚

I like that ðŸ™‚ Very good point… It’s always interesting to see how an “underground hacking society” adjusts to the main stream. Definitely something I now have tagged to keep an eye on. It seems to me that the bridge to the mainstream world can be a difficult bridge to build, and in many cases results in something similar to “Galloping Gurdy” because of some key design flaws that, at the time, were not obvious enough to have warranted consideration.
